Headline: #29 State Temporary Southbound Reroute near Lafayette/79th
ShortDescription: Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 79th, Vincennes 83rd, due to street blockage near Lafayette/79th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 79th, Vincennes 83rd and resume normal route due to  street blockage near Lafayette/79th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #52 Kedzie/California and #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute near Chicago/Troy
ShortDescription: #52 Kedzie/California and #66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Chicago/Troy, due to police activity near Chicago/Troy.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#52 Kedzie/California and #66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Chicago/Troy, due to police activity near Chicago/Troy.

Westbound #66 Chicago buses will operate via Chicago, Sacramento, Grand, Kedzie, Chicago and over regular route.

Northbound #52 Kedzie/California buses will operate via Kedzie and Chicago.

Southbound #52 Kedzie/California buses will operate via Kedzie, Augusta, Homan, Chicago, Kedzie and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #62 & #62H Archer/Harlem Temporary Southbound Reroute near Archer/Leamington
ShortDescription: Southbound 62 Archer & 62H Archer/Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted near Archer/Leamington due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #62 Archer & #62H Archer/Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted near Archer/Leamington due to police activity.

Southbound #62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Archer, Cicero, 55th, Central and Archer: due to street blockage near Archer/Leamington.

Southbound #62H Archer/Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, 55th, Central and Archer: due to street blockage near Archer/Leamington.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
